dmca.title: Ziff Davis Media complains to Blogger
dmca.body:
Domain Name: blogspot.com 
Registrant: Google Inc. 
[Private] 
CA 94043 US 
[Private]@google.com

December 12, 2006 

Dear Sirs: 

Ziff Davis Media Inc. ("Ziff Davis") swears under penalty of perjury that the information contained in this notice is accurate and that [Private], Director of Intellectual Property at Ziff Davis, is authorized to act on behalf of Ziff Davis, publisher of PC Magazine and the www.pcmag.com website, and owner of the exclusive copyrights that are infringed.

Ziff Davis has reasonable good faith belief that use for the material in the manner complained of in the attached report is not authorized by Ziff Davis, its agents, or the law. The information provided herein is accurate to the best of our knowledge. Therefore, this letter is an official notification under provisions of section 512(c) of the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the detected infringement listed below:
 
http://laptop
